pros: colleagues are great to work with
cons: communication with admin isn't efficient or helpful

pros: Friendly people, decent pay and great time off/holidays perks
cons: Health Insurance plan isn't that great, the communication from higher ups needs improvement and both feedback and development opportunities should be made available to all employees.

pros: Most of the staff and faculty are easy to work with. Good benefits.

pros: Good for communication in this industry and others

job_title: Teacher, Secondary School in Atlanta, GA
pros: Free lunch, good benefits, caring community, lots of autonomy, fantastic leadership
cons: School is way too easy and students are not held accountable. Not the teachers' fault because they are told to go very easy on the students.

job_title: Teacher, High School Science in Atlanta, GA
pros: Colleagues, both teaching and non-teaching staff)
cons: Too slow to embrace progressive, best practices. And way behind on DEI.

pros: Loved being around the kids and some of the faculty staff.
cons: Holy Innocents' make employees believe that they care about your livelihood, as I found out that my loyalty and hard work for two days shy of 24yrs doesn't matter. I was released from my job even though the lady in hr said I did my job, yet they was doing some reconstruction. I thought to myself, really!!! Hard work for that company don't means nothing. A loyal and hard worker was let go. A worker that did her job was given  two checks, no unemployment, even though I tried. Hies don't care at all about anybody's hard work and loyalty to a company. I'm not surprise after new managers was brought in at the school. It's just Bible prophecy being fulfilled. Second Timothy chapter 3 and verses 1-5 talks about the times we're living in.

review_title: Great place to work - the sky is the limit
job_title: Teacher, Secondary School in Atlanta, GA
pros: Fantastic colleagues, great working conditions for a teacher. The school really invests in their faculty. The students are nice and generally well behaved. Class sizes are small.
cons: The Upper School needs a new bell schedule. We should be getting one soon.
